name: FNGJ 2020-37 - RGB Fiddle
description:
Click the + - RGB buttons to change the color under the ball.  When the color matches a neighboring color, the ball moves to that square.  Get the the goal square in the fewest moves.

Lowest Moves:

Level 1 - 115 - willy8bit

Level 2 - 141 - willy8bit

Level 3 - ???
